group_1.textRight: I'm baaaaaack!

group_1.textLeft: We should be able to find an answer at an@an expedited rate, now Touka's here.

group_1.textCenter: Yeah.

group_1.textRight: What are you talking about?
Wait, no... Ui, don't tell me!
Your tests found something bad, right as@you were about to leave the hospital?
Your BNP levels, maybe?

group_1.textLeft: I already asked her the same thing.

group_1.textCenter: The test results are just as good as they@ever were...
The thing is, I'm not actually worried about@myself. I'm worried about Iroha.

group_1.textRight: Iroha...?

group_1.textCenter: Remember the other day, when we saw her@fighting?
I don't think she's stopped fighting those@things since.
Sometimes it really looks like it's taking a @toll on her. I can't bear to watch it.
I really want her to stop fighting.

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, that is quite the dilemma.
But how do we stop her without knowing what@it is that we want her to stop?

group_1.textRight: She's a Magical Girl.

group_1.textLeft: Touka, this is serious. I'm worried about@Ui and her sister.
Now isn't the time for silly jokes.

group_1.textRight: I'm serious, too.
I think it's stranger to NOT believe in it,@after we saw that bizarre place.

group_1.textCenter: Touka, please tell me! What is a Magical@Girl?

group_1.textRight: You don't need to panic, I'll tell you.@I think it's for Iroha's own good that I do.
Because once you hear what I have to say,@you'll realize what you need to do.
There's a way to save her...

group_1.textLeft: I think I'm at about 100% comprehension now.

group_1.textCenter: I'm at something like 70%...
Don't forget, I'm not as smart as either of@you two!

group_1.textRight: Still, the basics of what a Magical Girl is@and the things your sister's been doing...
You get those parts at least, right?

group_1.textCenter: Yes, I understood that part.
And the bit about the Witch and the@Labyrinth... And...
I understood that if we use the method you@talked about, and it works...
It'll help everyone, right?

group_1.textRight: That's it exactly!

group_1.textLeft: All three of us will get better, and we can@help Iroha...and lots of other people, too.

group_1.textCenter: But will it really work?

group_1.textLeft: Touka does tend to say things that annoy@people...
However... I know that she would never@discuss something untethered from reality.
Since she's the one proposing this plan, I@feel confident placing my faith in it.

group_1.textRight: I'm so glad to hear you say that!
But I am a little annoyed you said I annoy@people.

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, I let some of my derision slip.

group_1.textRight: Nyaaaaaargh!!!

group_1.textCenter: Guys! Don't fight!

group_1.textRight: Hmph!
It's a tricky topic, anyway, so I won't be@hasty about putting it into practice.
We won't take any action until you@understand it completely, Ui.

group_1.textCenter: Then I want you to explain it to me again, @right away!
I don't have any time to waste!
I want to save Iroha as soon as possible!

group_1.textRight: I know how you feel.
I'll explain it as many times as it takes!

group_1.narration: The first thing to understand is that there@are pros and cons to being a Magical Girl.
Advantages include a healthy body with @increased strength and stamina.
The drawback is that you are@required to battle Witches.
You also must bear the burden of@eventually becoming a Witch yourself.
Just based on that, it sounds like@there's an awful lot of bad to be had.
But we actually only need to get rid of the@becoming a Witch part to make things much@better, not only for us, but all mankind.
Magical Girls fight Witches so they can@gain Grief Seeds, which are necessary to@delay the process of becoming a Witch.
But if we eliminate that end result entirely,@there'd be no more need to fight Witches!
By doing so we'd intrinsically@be saving Iroha!

group_1.textCenter: And to do that...
All three of us need to become Magical Girls?

group_1.textRight: That's right.
The three of us can use our wishes to@eliminate the fates of every Magical Girl.

group_1.textCenter: And Iroha will be saved...

group_1.textLeft: Also, when our wishes are granted, we won't@have to be tormented by that fate either.

group_1.textRight: Quite the opposite, in fact! We'd become@Magical Girls and be granted strong bodies.
So all three of us and Iroha can all live@happily ever after!
Happy, healthy, and able to pursue our dreams@as we see fit!

group_1.textLeft: Then...the most important step is the wish@we make, isn't it?

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's the most important part.

group_1.textCenter: Okay.

group_1.narration: I'm sure we won't be allowed to wish as a@trio for something like "erase the fates of@Magical Girls". It'd violate natural law.
So instead, the three of us will wish, one@by one, to snatch away one of the powers@that Kyubey possesses.
First, Ui will take the power to "harvest",@used to send energies like impurities as well@as phase transition energy into space.
I'll take the power to "convert", used@to transform harvested energy as well@as human souls into magic.
And Nemu will take the power to "manifest",@or grant energy a physical form, much like@when Kyubey creates a Soul Gem.
With all three of those powers, we can put@our plan into motion to free all Magical@Girls from the fates that doom them!
First up is Ui!
Once Nemu and I have enough impurities,@you can use your power to harvest them.
Then you can pass it on to me,@along with a bit of your own magic.
Then it's my turn!
I'll take the impurities and convert them@into magic for Magical Girls to use freely.
Then I'll pass that magic on to Nemu,@with a bit of my magic.
Nemu will finish up!
She'll use her magic, along with the magic@I gave to her, to give that energy a physical@form, just like how Soul Gems are created.
She'll make an automatic purification system.
The three of us would use our magic to make@a system with all the same functions Kyubey@has. It would automatically both gather@energy and deliver it to outer space.
That would also address the issue Kyubey@talked about: the entropy of the universe.@It's a gold-star situation all around!
This way, all three of us and Iroha@get to have our happy ending!

group_1.textRight: What do you think?

group_1.textCenter: I think I got it all that time!
I'll become a Magical Girl with you guys.

group_1.textRight: I'm glad it all made sense to you!

group_1.textLeft: We might be able to widen the scope of the@purification by expanding the system, too.

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's another goal.
If we can get Kyubey to negotiate with us...
We can ask about all kinds of things.@Including outer space! *Giggle*

group_1.textCenter: Outer space?
